resources.string: Delete my location from the Map
I Need A Ride\n Back To My Car
Enter your Bronco ID and a description about yourself and your car
Description about yourself and your car i.e. brown hair and red t-shirt in black Toyota Camry.
Select a parking spot or student to pick up. Parking spots are in green. Students are in yellow.
Press the button below once you arrive at the location
Select the approximate location your car is parked on the map by long pressing on it. Zoom in for better accuracy.
You will receive a notification when your driver arrives at your parking location.
Enter your Bronco ID and a description of your car and its location
Description of your car and its location. i.e. Blue Honda Civic, parking structure, section 3C
Select the approximate location you will be waiting on the map by long pressing on it. Zoom in for better accuracy.
Enter your Bronco ID and a description of yourself
Description of yourself. i.e. black hair, red shirt, blue pants.
You will receive a notification when your driver arrives at your location.
